citation: Civil Process (Table of Fees for Execution) Amendment Rules 2012 (Tas)
text:
Civil Process (Table of Fees for Execution) Amendment Rules 2012

29 June 2012

We, the Honourable Peter Ethrington Evans, the Honourable Alan Michael Blow, OAM, the Honourable Shan Eve Tennent, the Honourable David James Porter and the Honourable Helen Marie Wood, Puisne Judges of the Supreme Court of Tasmania, on the recommendation of the Rule Committee, make the following Rules of Court under the Civil Process Act 1870 .

1. Short title
    These Rules of Court may be cited as the Civil Process (Table of Fees for Execution) Amendment Rules 2012 .

2. Commencement
    These Rules of Court take effect on 1 August 2012.

3. Schedule 1 amended (Table of Fees for Execution of Civil Process)
    Schedule 1 to the Civil Process (Table of Fees for Execution) Rules 1991 is amended as follows:
            (a) by omitting from item 1(a) "50.00" and substituting "100.00";
            (b) by omitting from item 1(b) "100.00" and substituting "200.00";
            (c) by omitting from item 2(b) "0.60" and substituting "0.70";
            (d) by omitting from item 3 "amount, or if auctioneer employed" and substituting "amount";
            (e) by omitting from item 5 "40.00" and substituting "55.00".

P. E. EVANS

Puisne Judge

A. M. BLOW

Puisne Judge

S. E. TENNENT

Puisne Judge

D. J. PORTER

Puisne Judge

H. M. WOOD

Puisne Judge

Countersigned,

J. A. CONNOLLY

Registrar

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 11 July 2012

These Rules of Court are administered in the Department of Justice.
